articles.title: US soldier believed to be detained by North Korea after crossing border - CNN
articles.description: An American believed to have been detained in North Korea after crossing the inter-Korean border during a tour is a US Army soldier, a US official told CNN on Tuesday.
articles.content:
An American believed to have been detained in North Korea after crossing the inter-Korean border during a tour is a US Army soldier, a US official told CNN on Tuesday.

articles.title: Bank of America tops analysts’ expectations amid higher interest rates - CNBC
articles.description: While analysts expected Bank of America to be one of the top beneficiaries of rising interest rates, it hasn't played out that way.
articles.content:
Bank of America on Tuesday posted second-quarter profit and revenue that edged out expectations as the company reaped more interest income amid higher rates.
